The Death of Apathy

paragraphs.text: The world will see me clearly now that I am free from thee, apathy

“Well, feature me!” said the Australian.

paragraphs.text: Come on now, Greg! I was waiting for you! Y’all did this! Where’s Kate and Kaj Schougaard and Byrdie? I hope y’all are seeing this! Thank you for responding, Greg ❤
Amazing Tre!
paragraphs.name: 99ea

paragraphs.text: Featured —
paragraphs.name: f027

paragraphs.text: Gently the one-liners poured, disturbing not a creature; till, at last into a deluge grown, it was now — a feature!

53e40aa540e9.title: I had this crazy idea we all needed to band together to get a poem onto “top stories”.

paragraphs.text: I had this crazy idea we all needed to band together to get a poem onto “top stories”. Just pick one person, and that is where I ran into a wall. Who would we pick to elevate poetry? Did it need elevating?
paragraphs.name: d011

paragraphs.text: It was mostly a game.
paragraphs.name: 83bd

paragraphs.text: So, here’s you, Tre, doing your thing. Let’s not forget, S. Lynn Knight! Tag team of destiny!
paragraphs.name: 785b

paragraphs.text: Game over.
paragraphs.name: 10fd

paragraphs.text: Every week, you move me
paragraphs.name: ec81

paragraphs.text: And, last week. I needed your words most.
paragraphs.name: b933

paragraphs.text: And, here you are.
paragraphs.name: de34

paragraphs.text: And, I am happy.
paragraphs.name: e2ff

paragraphs.text: Thank you for responding, Kaj. Please enjoy your weekend. :)
